# assistiveAccess

**Type Property**

Apply the visual style used in Assistive Access on iOS and iPadOS. On other platforms, this is a no-op.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor static var assistiveAccess: PreviewTrait<Preview.ViewTraits> { get }
```
title: assistiveAccess
